pages.text: The first mob added to the mod, the Wildfire is a dangerous Nether mob

The Wildfire is a blaze-like mob that patrols the Nether. It is an uncommon, "random encounter" spawn, and when it shows up it spawns several Blazes along with it. It is capable of shooting a line of fireballs at its enemies, and can put up its shields to block damage.$(br2)Drops: $(l:items/wildfire_piece)Molten Shard$(/l), $(l:items/wildfire_helmet)Wildfire Helmet$(/l)
